segments.text: I think it is time to study . Our chemistry exam is coming .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I know . When is it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It seems to be from chapter six to chapter ten .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well . I think I'm going to fail my chemistry exam .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm not being pessimistic . I'm being realistic . My chemistry is so bad .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I believe you can pass the exam with good preparation . Don't lose your heart .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . That's very nice of you .
segments.speaker: S2
